title: Our Team
description: Meet the members of the OneLiteFeather team behind our projects.

ranks.name: Administrator
ranks.description: Responsible for managing and developing the platform.

members.name: Max Mustermann
members.quote: Together we build a great community!
members.bio: Max is an experienced administrator with a passion for building communities. He has been with OneLiteFeather since the beginning and has contributed to many of our projects.

members.name: Anna Schmidt
members.quote: Creativity and collaboration are the keys to success.
members.bio: Anna is a creative developer who loves to collaborate with others. She has been instrumental in developing many of our core features.

ranks.name: Moderator
ranks.description: Supports the community and ensures a pleasant gaming experience.

members.name: Tom Weber
members.quote: I'm happy to help where I can!
members.bio: Tom is a dedicated moderator who is always ready to help community members. He has a keen eye for detail and ensures that our community guidelines are followed.

members.name: Lisa MÃ¼ller
members.bio: Lisa is our newest moderator and is currently on probation. She brings fresh perspectives and is learning the ropes of community management.

ranks.name: Builder
ranks.description: Creative minds who shape our worlds.

members.name: Jan Becker
members.bio: Jan is a talented builder with an eye for detail. He specializes in creating immersive environments that tell a story through architecture and design.

members.name: Sophie Klein
members.bio: Sophie is a creative builder who loves to experiment with different styles and techniques. She has contributed to several of our most visually stunning projects.

rankExplanations.description: Administrators have full rights on the server and are responsible for the technical infrastructure, development, and strategic decisions.
Moderators help enforce the rules, resolve conflicts, and ensure a pleasant gaming experience for everyone.
Builders are responsible for designing the game worlds and contribute creative ideas to create unique environments.
